name: Final Rage DX
description:
Are you looking for some Fun, Fast-Paced Top-Down Shooter?

Well, Final Rage DX is something for you!!! Get your self 2 swords and exterminate you're way to the CEO of |E.V.I.L LAB INC|

Final Rage, is an top-down shooter, where you use swords (and magic) to exterminate hundreds upon hundreds of |E.V.I.L LAB INC| workers in trully amazing way.

Some Of the music, from teknoaxe:

Cranked To Eleven: http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1533
